article_text:
Election 2016

Why This GOP Woman Is #NeverTrump

Katrina Jørgensen has spent years of her life working to promote the Republican Party and conservative causes. But this week, the 30-year-old quit a leadership post in one of the most prominent political organizations for young GOP voters. The reason? Donald Trump

Torey Van Oot

article_metadata.sailthru.author: A.C.L.U.
article_metadata.description: These are the five scariest things Catholic bishops have ever said about women.

og.description: The U.S. Conference of Catholic Bishops is not just a religious organization; it's also a major political force in the U.S. In the past several years, the group has spent a huge amount of time and money fighting against the Affordable Care Act and non-discrimination laws throughout the country.
og.title: The Top 5 Scariest Things Catholic Bishops Have Said About Women
